title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister public expenditure reform) order 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Grant Sweetnam, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Grant Sweetnam, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform, Government 
Buildings, Upper Merrion Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform with effect from 7 July 2020.
text_norm: 2 grant sweetnam particular whose address deposited office department public expenditure reform government building upper merrion street dublin 2 appointed special adviser minister public expenditure reform effect 7 july 2020

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Kevin Barrett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Kevin Barrett, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform, Government 
Buildings, Upper Merrion Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform with effect from 21 
September 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

29 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [397] 3
